name: ditgex
params: setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2

stmt.origin: eqeltri(cdit(s0, c0, c1, c2), universe, cif(citg(s0, co(c0, cioo, c1), c2), cneg(citg(s0, co(c1, cioo, c0), c2)), wbr(c0, cle, c1)))

body.origin:
|- wcel(cdit(s0, c0, c1, c2), universe)
-| wceq(cdit(s0, c0, c1, c2), cif(citg(s0, co(c0, cioo, c1), c2), cneg(citg(s0, co(c1, cioo, c0), c2)), wbr(c0, cle, c1)))
-| wcel(cif(citg(s0, co(c0, cioo, c1), c2), cneg(citg(s0, co(c1, cioo, c0), c2)), wbr(c0, cle, c1)), universe)

-| wcel(cif(citg(s0, co(c0, cioo, c1), c2), cneg(citg(s0, co(c1, cioo, c0), c2)), wbr(c0, cle, c1)), universe)
